Package kozlov.kirill.creditbook

Class Student.CreditBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • kozlov.kirill.creditbook.Student.CreditBook
  • Enclosing class:
    Student
    public static class Student.CreditBook
extends java.lang.Object
    Credit book class. The reason for inner class is the idea that we cannot create credit book without student

    • Method Detail

      • addMark

        public Mark addMark​(int value,
                    Subject subject)
        New mark adder. We cannot add new Mark weather we have already added Mark with the same semester and subject
        Parameters:
        value - value of mark
        subject - learning subject
        Returns:
        Mark object weather new mark has been added and null otherwise

      • getMarks

        public java.util.Set<Mark> getMarks()

      • averageMark

        public double averageMark()
        Average mark estimator.
        Returns:
        average value for all marks.

      • canObtainIncreasedScholarship

        public boolean canObtainIncreasedScholarship()
        Predicate for obtaining increased scholarship.
        Returns:
        true weather student has only 5 marks in previous semester (so it's always false for the first semester)

      • canObtainRedDiploma

        public boolean canObtainRedDiploma()
        Predicate for obtaining red diploma.
        Returns:
        true weather student can obtain red diploma so:
        1. Last marks greater or equal to 4
        2. Average value of last marks greater or equal to 4.75
        3. Diploma has mark 5

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
        CreditBooks override comparator.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - other object for comparing
        Returns:
        true weather objects of class CreditBook has the same id
